document_data.name: Spruce
document_data.mainbody: '''Spruces''' were type of coniferous [[:Category:Trees|tree]], part of a family of trees known as evergreens.

Habitats.Beyond Faerûn:
* On [[Evermeet]], spruces were known to grow near [[Tower Reilloch]].
* In [[Kara-Tur]], spruces could be found in the [[Hochi Province]] of [[Kozakura]].{{Cite dungeon/17/The Waiting Room of Yen-Wang-Yeh|34}}
